page.title: 04Recreation.
page.content: We have riding stables where some children have lessons every week. In the Parish Hall, the Drama Group put on two or three productions during the year. On our local park there is a B.M.X. track,jogging track,tennis courts a new bowling green and football pitches. We have two football teams, Brinsley Youth and Brinsley Magpies. Our villages main attraction is our annual Carnival, this takes months of organising by the Carnival Committee. The Carnival Queen is chosen by the children at school. The Queens float leads the Carnival procession of decorated floats through the village. The Carnival is always a huge success. The Carnival Committee also organise a Firework Display every year in November and the same Committee, with Santa on his sleigh, go round the village each Christmas.
